詉字的基本解释

詉
náo
古同“呶”，喧哗。

詉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［náo］
［《集韻》尼交切，平爻，泥。］
同“呶1”。
(1)喧哗。
(2)见“詉詉”。
[②]［ná］
［《廣韻》女加切，平麻，娘。］
同“呶2”。

詉字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詉； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1154第07
【集韻】尼交切，音鐃。與呶同。讙聲也。【舊唐書·徐彥伯傳】以號詉爲令德。【宋史·高斯得傳】時上封事言得失者衆，或者惡其讙詉。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?女加切，音拏。【玉篇】譇詉，言不可解也。【廣韻】語貌。【類篇】羞窮也。【集韻】或作訤。　又【集韻】奴故切，音怒。惡言也。　又【集韻】乃嫁切，拏去聲。詐也。

詉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
詉字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [náo]
["Ji Yun" Ni cross cut, flat line, mud. ]
Same as "呶1".
(1) Noise.
(2) See "詉詉".
[②]［ná］
["Guangyun" female Jiaqie, Pingma, mother. ]
Same as "呶2".

[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　詉; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 1154 to 07
【Ji Yun】Ni cross cut, sound 铙. Same with 呶. The sound is also. [Old Book of Tang Dynasty·Xu Yanbo Biography] Take the name of the name as the order of virtue. [Song History·Gao Si De Biography] At the time, many people who had gained and lost things were sealed, or they were slanderous.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Female add cut, sound take. [Jade articles] Jian 詉, the words are incomprehensible. [Guangyun] Language appearance. [Classes] Shame and poor. 【Ji Yun】or as a tassel.　[Jiyun] Slave the old and cut, the sound is angry. Bad words too.　[Jiyun] is to marry and cut, take the sound. Fraud also.
